arts.ttl: Boukhalfa and Smith hail "incredible performance" against Leverkusen
arts.sum: Alexander Blessin's team fought tooth and nail for a richly deserved point against the reigning Bundesliga champions.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli brings Leverkusen's title dreams to a hold
arts.sum: Reigning Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen drop two crucial points in the 2024/25 title race! Xabi Alonso's side can't get more than a 1-1 draw against promoted side St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli fight back to hold defending champions Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen's grasp on the Meisterschale loosened further after Carlo Boukhalfa's late equaliser for St. Pauli cancelled out Patrik Schick's opener in a battling draw at the Millerntor. Despite St. Pauli's efforts, including a powerful shot from Carlo Boukhalfa that forced a save from Lukáš Hrádecký, the visitors held their advantage going into the break.

arts.ttl: Puerta clause activated: Leverkusen loanee to join Hull permanently from July 1st
arts.sum: Hull confirm the Colombian midfielder will remain at the club beyond his loan spell from Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli strive for permanent purchase of Morgan Guilavogui
arts.sum: The local Hamburger Abendblatt reports that FC St. Pauli are eager to sign attacker Morgan Guilavogui permanently.

arts.ttl: Granit Xhaka considers Bayer Leverkusen future amid Xabi Alonso and Florian Wirtz departure talks
arts.sum: Sky Germany is currently reporting that Bayer Leverkusen midfield linchpin Granit Xhaka is considering departing the club.

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach interested in St. Pauli winger Elias Saad
arts.sum: Florian Plettenberg reports that Borussia Mönchengladbach are reportedly interested in plying Elias Saad away from FC St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli v Bayer Leverkusen preview: Defending champions travel to newly-promoted Pauli
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen hope to stay in the title race with a win against the in-form Pauli side.

arts.ttl: How much Real Madrid may have to pay to hire Xabi Alonso
arts.sum: Real Madrid could have to pay a record-breaking fee to break Xabi Alonso's Bayer Leverkusen contract and bring him back to the Spanish capital.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso dismisses ‘speculation and rumours’ after Real Madrid links
arts.sum: The Bayer Leverkusen manager has been mentioned as a possible successor to Carlo Ancelotti in the Spanish capital
